Specifics (Republican Party National Convention, 2004). Policies & Procedures. World Trade Center. Reference.

Mostly files on high-rise building evacuation and firefighting issues, circa 2002-2004, related at least in part to response to WTC; some reference material in the files back to 1980s. Includes James Lee Witt report on Cook County Admin Building fire of 2003. File on "Evacuation Plan" with BOMA (Building Owners and Managers Association of New York) emergency action plan white paper and Powerpoint of presentation to FDNY (2004), with drafts of FDNY's plan and other reference material. McKinsey report "Increasing FDNY's Preparedness" (final and draft with related material), 2002. Files on various matters re high-rises: sound powered phones, certificates of occupancy, alarm revisions, exit signage, codes, stairway sprinkler pressure, communications technology (files date from 2002-03, with earlier documents). Thick file of material on the 2004 Republican National Convention (RNC) at Madison Square Garden, with many maps (folded/oversize) of the floor plan of MSG and of the Farley Post Office showing media locations, etc during convention, with drafts and other material of emergency plan for the Post Office.
